title: under subsection (9) of that section, hereby make the following order, with
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by 
the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks Act 2022 (Designation of Sligo County 
Council) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited remediation dwelling damaged use defective concrete block act 2022 (designation sligo county council) order 2024

title: under subsection (9) of that section, hereby make the following order, with
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 23 October 2024.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 23 October 2024.

title: under subsection (9) of that section, hereby make the following order, with
heading: 3. Sligo County Council is designated to be a designated local authority in
text_raw:
3. Sligo County Council is designated to be a designated local authority in 

respect of the whole of its administrative area for the purposes of the 
Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks 
Act 2022 (No. 28 of 2022). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 October, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [578] 3
